channel.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
channel.description:
[url]https://www.systemwars.com/forums/showthread.php?87446-WETA-built-Valve-a-real-TF2-Sentry-and-it-s-fucking-awesome[/url].
So question: why are Valve visiting Weta - you know, the folks responsible for Lord of the Rings and District 9, among other things? Might this have anything to do with a half-life movie...?

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
But perhaps the “sentry gun is for our lobby” is actually just a cover story because they’ve been there to actually look into…

HEV SUITS FOR THE FILM! WOOOO!

Read full topic

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Crusader1025
item.description:
Trigger_Proximity:

You fools. It was to commision a Sentry Gun. Weta Workshop is a really great high quality prop maker. Thus they were the logical choice for something awesome to spruce up their lobby.

You mean this? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j1kccz1qziE

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: phaeton_nz
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

I admit, I haven’t seen all of his movies, but I haven’t particularly liked any of the ones I’ve seen, for various reasons.

Watch ‘Heavenly Creatures’ - a brilliantly disturbing movie based on true events made by Jackson long before LOTR.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

As much as I love Half-Life, I wouldn’t see it. Before LoTR, Peter Jackson made campy movies that weren’t very good. Including and after LoTR, Peter Jackson made movies that were too long and quite boring. And I enjoyed the LoTR storyline as a whole.

How about we let Peter Jackson’s good pal Neil Blomkamp take care of it?

Read full topic

item.description:
if you give me an unlimited amount of money, I’ll tell you when it’s done.
[COLOR=‘Black’]Which will be never. Because I won’t work on it.

item.source: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
DanO:

Yees, I know it’s about the sentry gun they made. I wasn’t aware major film studios were generally in the habit of making props for people’s lobbies. I was hoping for some massively idle speculation like, you know “OMG they’re gonna make a half-life trilogy with Peter Jackson directing and it’s gonna be in new brain-o-vision, directly beamed into the base of the sensory cortex.”

But no. Well fine.

flounces out of the room

Anyone will do anything for the right amount of money.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Aggh didn’t you guys learn anything in school. Why can no one get the valve are/is thing right. It’s Valve IS, VALVE IS. Valve is a group and is thus referred to as a singular.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
danielsangeo:

For a while, my Windows sound scheme was nothing but Aperture Science turret quotes. When I logged into Windows, “There you are.” Error message: “Owowowowowow…” Close a program: “I don’t blame you.” Log out: “Sleep mode activated.”

Was extraordinarily cute.

Haha that’s awesome! Gotta try that sometime. Though I need to make sure the files are quiet enough. I tried using some TF2 sound files for my Windows sound scheme and they ended up being so loud I’d jump every time something happened.

Me: quietly browsing the internet
Computer: I BROKE YOUR STUPID CRAP MORON
Me: :aah::FFFUUU:

Read full topic

item.source: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Sitten_duck
item.description:
I’m not surprised Valve’s visited Weta workshop, if I remember right, Valve hired one of the prominent individuals who worked on animating Golem’s face to assist them in improving their facial animations. I wouldn’t be surprised if Valve has spoken with Weta digital about licensing proprietary software and the like to help improve the source engine. Newell probably dropped by Weta workshop afterword and asked if they might make him a sentry.

I wouldn’t read into anything, though. Right now Weta workshop is probably got their hands tied with The Hobbit preproduction and won’t have time for very many other projects for a good long while.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: DEATH_eVADER
item.description:
DanO:

Yees, I know it’s about the sentry gun they made. I wasn’t aware major film studios were generally in the habit of making props for people’s lobbies.

They will make props for anyone (Replica or Custom) as long as your willing to pay good sums of money for manufacture and delivery.

I was hoping to get money to buy the this full size replica; and who knows, If both Valve and Weta agree to it, we may be able to purchase the sentry gun in the near future
https://www.wetanz.com/arc-generator-full-scale-replica/from/type

Read full topic

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

As much as I love Half-Life, I wouldn’t see it. Before LoTR, Peter Jackson made campy movies that weren’t very good.

Whoa, that’s a load of crap. Braindead is an outright classic in the horror genre, and Heavenly Creatures was a very acclaimed drama.

But he still shouldn’t do a Half-Life movie. He would have been perfect as a producer on the Halo movie though. Too bad that deal fell through.

Read full topic

item.description:
DanO:

So question: why are Valve visiting Weta - you know, the folks responsible for Lord of the Rings and District 9, among other things? Might this have anything to do with a half-life movie…?

because it was guys from weta who gave them hints on how to make antlions look this awesome. later, a couple folk from weta went to work for valve.

item.title: Why are valve visiting Weta workshop? Massively idle speculation
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
I don’t know, it probably means nothing. Valve got to visit Weta, and they asked them to build them a sentry gun. Probably as open and shut as that. There’s a possibility there was another purpose behind their visit but I wouldn’t get my hopes up.

Read full topic
